endpoints: { "name": "CellProfiler API", "nginx": { "port": "8080", "additional": "if (${CP_DOLLAR}request_method = OPTIONS ) { add_header Content-Length 0;add_header Content-Type text/plain;add_header Access-Control-Allow-Headers *;add_header Access-Control-Allow-Methods *;add_header Access-Control-Allow-Origin https://${CP_API_SRV_EXTERNAL_HOST}:${CP_API_SRV_EXTERNAL_PORT};add_header Vary Origin;return 200;}add_header Access-Control-Allow-Origin https://${CP_API_SRV_EXTERNAL_HOST}:${CP_API_SRV_EXTERNAL_PORT};add_header Vary Origin;add_header Access-Control-Allow-Headers *;add_header Access-Control-Allow-Methods *;" }, "isDefault": true }
